basic.Source: Synthetic construct (derived from residues 6–34 of lumbricin I)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.9784609]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 62037 (MIC=8 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15752 (MIC=12 µg/ml), Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175 (MIC=20 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 27325 (MIC=8 µg/ml), Pseudomonas putidaATCC 17426 (MIC=12 µg/ml), Serratia sp. ATCC 21074 (MIC=12 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC 10231 (MIC=12 µg/ml), Cryptococcus neoformance ATCC 34881 (MIC=16 µg/ml), Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 44774 (MIC=8 µg/ml).NOTE:Minimal inhibitory concentrations were determined by incubating approximately 104–105 CFU/ml of cells with serial dilutions of each peptide in a 96-well microtiter plate..
